bike.description: Fuji Altair 2 aluminum, custom butted and shaped with PowerDiamond down tube, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, water bottle mount

components.description: NEW TruVativ Firex Team GXP W/Integrated spindle, 22/32/44T
Shimano Deore LX Dual Control Shifter/Hydraulic Brake Lever
Ritchey Logic Zero Comp 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji Altair 2 aluminum, custom butted and shaped with Four Bar linkage system (80-110m travel), Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots
Manitou Black Elite 30mm stanchions, 100mm Travel w/ Remote LO
X-Fusion O2 RL w/ Compression and Rebound control
Shimano Deore LX Dual Control Shifter/Hydraulic Brake Lever 27-speed
